SEARCH
Package net.elena.murat.material

Class SphereWordTextureMaterial

java.lang.Object
net.elena.murat.material.SphereWordTextureMaterial
All Implemented Interfaces:
Material
public class SphereWordTextureMaterial extends Object implements Material
Material that applies a spherical texture with a word drawn on it. The word is rendered on a texture mapped onto a sphere. Supports transparency, reflectivity, gradient text, and background image parameters.

    Constructor with default background color (transparent black), reflectivity=0.3, ior=1.0, transparency=0.0 (opaque), no offsets.

  • Constructor Details

    • SphereWordTextureMaterial

      public SphereWordTextureMaterial(String word, Color textColor, String fontFamily, int fontStyle, int fontSize)
      Constructor with default background color (transparent black), reflectivity=0.3, ior=1.0, transparency=0.0 (opaque), no offsets. No gradient (uses solid textColor) and no background image.

    • SphereWordTextureMaterial

      public SphereWordTextureMaterial(String word, Color textColor, Color gradientColor, String gradientType, Color bgColor, String fontFamily, int fontStyle, int fontSize, double reflectivity, double ior, double transparency, int uOffset, int vOffset, BufferedImage imageObject, int imageWidth, int imageHeight, int imageUOffset, int imageVOffset)
      Full constructor with all parameters.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to render on the sphere texture.
      textColor - Primary text color (also used for gradient start/end depending on type).
      gradientColor - Secondary color for gradient effect. If null, solid textColor is used.
      gradientType - Type of gradient: "horizontal", "vertical", "diagonal".
      bgColor - Background color of the texture.
      fontFamily - Font family name.
      fontStyle - Font style (Font.PLAIN, Font.BOLD, etc).
      fontSize - Font size in points.
      reflectivity - Reflectivity coefficient [0..1].
      ior - Index of refraction (>=1.0).
      uOffset - Horizontal pixel offset for text positioning.
      vOffset - Vertical pixel offset for text positioning.
      imageObject - BufferedImage to draw on the background, can be null.
      imageWidth - Width to draw the image.
      imageHeight - Height to draw the image.
      imageUOffset - Horizontal pixel offset for image positioning.
      imageVOffset - Vertical pixel offset for image positioning.

  • Method Details

    • convertToNorwegianText

      public static String convertToNorwegianText(String input)
      Converts English character sequences to Norwegian special characters. For example, "AE" -> "Æ", "O/" -> "Ø", "A0" -> "Å", etc.
      Parameters:
      input - Input string possibly containing English sequences.
      Returns:
      Converted string with Norwegian characters.

    • setObjectTransform

      public void setObjectTransform(Matrix4 tm)
      Sets the inverse transform matrix of the object. This matrix is used to convert world coordinates to local object coordinates. Note: The method keeps the original implementation as requested.
      Specified by:
      setObjectTransform in interface Material
      Parameters:
      tm - The transformation matrix of the object.

    • getColorAt

      public Color getColorAt(Point3 worldPoint, Vector3 worldNormal, Light light, Point3 viewerPos)
      Returns the color of the material at the given world point, considering lighting and viewer position. Applies diffuse and specular lighting based on reflectivity and transparency. Uses dynamic transparency based on user's bgColor alpha.
      Specified by:
      getColorAt in interface Material
      Parameters:
      worldPoint - Point in world coordinates.
      worldNormal - Surface normal at the point.
      light - Light source affecting the point.
      viewerPos - Position of the viewer/camera.
      Returns:
      Color of the material at the point.
